sourcesContent:
import {Component, EventEmitter, Inject, Input, LOCALE_ID, OnInit, Output} from '@angular/core'; import {SeEclaimAdditionalInfo} from "app/claim/se-claim/model/se-eclaim-additional-info.model"; import {SeEclaimExpenseInfo} from "app/claim/se-claim/model/se-eclaim-expense-info.model"; import {SeEclaimReplacementInfo} from "app/claim/se-claim/model/se-eclaim-replacement-info.model"; import {Table} from "primeng/table"; import {formatDate} from "@angular/common"; import {ExportUtilsService} from "app/core/util/export-utils.service"; @Component({ selector: 'n2-additional-eclaim-info-section', templateUrl: './additional-eclaim-info-section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./additional-eclaim-info-section.component.scss'] }) export class AdditionalEclaimInfoSectionComponent implements OnInit { @Input() selected:boolean; @Output() selectedChange = new EventEmitter(); @Input() additionalInfo: SeEclaimAdditionalInfo; constructor( private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, @Inject(LOCALE_ID) protected localeId: string) { console.log("test"); } ngOnInit(): void { console.log("test"); } accordionClick(): void{ this.selectedChange.emit(this.selected); } calculateTotalExpensePayable(): number{ let sum = 0; this.additionalInfo.expenseInfoList.forEach((expenseInfo:SeEclaimExpenseInfo) => { sum += expenseInfo.expenseAmt; }) return sum; } exportExpenseTableToCSV(dataTable: Table): void{ const columns = [ {field: 'expenseItemName', header: 'Item Name', index: 0}, {field: 'expenseAmt', header: 'Amount', index: 1}, ]; const dtoList:any[] = []; let sum = 0; this.additionalInfo.expenseInfoList.forEach((expenseInfo:SeEclaimExpenseInfo) => { const dto = { expenseItemName: expenseInfo.expenseItemName, expenseAmt: expenseInfo.expenseAmt }; sum = sum + expenseInfo.expenseAmt; dtoList.push(dto); }); const lastRow = { nric: "", name: "", ratePerSession: "", totalSessions: "Total Payable", amount: sum.toFixed(2) } dtoList.push(lastRow); this.exportUtilsService.exportCSV(dataTable, dtoList,this.additionalInfo.expenseInfoList.length, columns, "eclaim_expense_data_".concat(formatDate(new Date(),"dd-MM-YYYY", this.localeId))); } }
